article:
For each of us, life is not easy. So when something unlucky happens, remember to believe in yourself.
When I was in a primary school, I was too _ in French   to pass the exams. I often got "E" or "F" on my papers. My classmates laughed _ me in class. I was very sad but could do _ . But later a French speech contest changed my life. _ it also changed my views on everything.
It was a Wednesday afternoon. My father asked me to take part in French contest.
It was a terrible idea! My French grades were _ bad.  "Don't worry, dear. Believe in yourself and you're sure to _ the contest. "After that my father and I chose a right topic. Then I worked hard at it. I spent a lot of my free time practicing it again and again in order not to miss a word. Finally, I was very _ in the contest. When my French teacher gave me a call and told me I got the first prize, I could hardly believe my _ . And my father was so excited that he _ say a word.
Then everything has changed for me. When I do anything, I always believe in myself and try my best to do it well.
